i dare you...

Name___________---Number____________--------Best time to call______________ I dare u to put this up and see how many numbers u get

the 1990's

1990

Anybody under the age of 13 should not read this,
and if you do, you should not repost this.
Just because you were born in '97 doesn't mean you're a 90's kid.
It's not like you could remember the original Simpsons.
I am sorry but three conscious years of the 90's just wont cut it.
You're a 90's kid if:
You can finish this [ice ice _ _ _ _ ]
You remember watching Doug, Ren & Stimpy, Pinky and the Brain and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
AAAAAAAH Real Monsters!
You've ever ended a sentence with the word "PSYCHE!"
You just cant resist finishing this . . . "Iiiiiiin west philidelphia born and raised . . ."
You remember TGIF, Step by Step, Family Matters, Dinosaurs, and Boy Meets World, mighty machines, and Thomas the tank engine, as well as Mr.Dressup.
You remember when it was actually worth getting up early
on a Saturday to watch cartoons.
You got super excited when it was Oregon Trail day in computer class at school.
You remember reading "Goosebumps"
You took plastic cartoon lunch boxes to school.
You still get the urge to say "NOT" after (almost) every sentence . . . not
when everything was settled by rock paper scissors..or bubble gum bubble gum in a dish...and even better daddy had a donkey inky binky bonky.
when you'd go to the same freakin place on a field trip every freakin year
when britney spears was cool and backstreet and nsync were gods.
when cops and robbers was a daily activity.
when we played Hide and go seek until our legs grew numb.
when we used to obey our parents
You used to listen to the radio all day long just to record your FAVORITE song of ALL time.
"Where in the World is Carmen San Diego?" was both a game and a TV game show.
Captain Planet. He's a Hero.
You knew that Kimberly, the pink ranger, and Tommy, the green ranger, were meant to be together.
You remember when Super Nintendos and Sega Genesis became popular.
You always wanted to send in a tape to America's Funniest Home Videos . . . but never taped anything funny.
You remember watching Home Alone 1, 2 , and 3 . . . and tried to pull the pranks on "intruders"
You remember watching The Magic School Bus, Wishbone, and Reading Rainbow on PBS.
You remember when Yo-Yos were cool.
You remember those Where's Waldo books.
You remember eating Warheads.
You remember watching the 1st Batman, Aladdin, Ninja Turtles, and 3 Ninjas movies.
You remember Ring Pops.
You remember drinking Surge, and Tang.
If you remember when every thing was "da BOMB!"
When they made the new lunchables so that you could make pizza AND tacos.
You remember boom boxes vs. cd players.
Making those little paper fortune cookie things, and then predicting your life with them.
You played and/or collected "Pogs"
You had at least one Tamagotchi, GigaPet, or Nano and brought it everywhere.
. . . Furbies.
You haven't always had a computer, and it was cool to have the internet.
And Windows 95 was the best.
You watched the original cartoons of Rugrats, Power Rangers, The original Transforms, and Ninja Turtles.
Michael Jordan was a king.
YIKES pencils and erasers were the stuff!
All your school supplies were "Lisa Frank" brand.
You remember when the new Beanie Babies and Talking Elmo were always sold out.
You collected those Beanie Babies.
Carebears
Gak was the coolest stuff invented.
Lambchop's song never ended.
The old dollar bills.
Silver dollars, which were cool to have.
You remember a time before the WB.
You collected all the Troll dolls
If you even know what an original Walkman is.
You remember wanting to sit on the orange Nickelodeon couch.
You've gotten creeped out by "Are You Afraid of the Dark?"
You know the Macarena by heart.
"Talk to the hand" . . . enough said
You always said, "Then why don't you marry it!"
You know the significance of the number 23.
When you played Super Mario on a daily basis.
Gameboy Pockets.
You went to McDonald's to play in the playplace.
You remember playing on merry go rounds at the playground.
Before the MySpace frenzy . . .
Before the Internet & text messaging . . .
Before Sidekicks & iPods . . .
Before Panic at the Disco . . .
Before PlayStation or X-BOX . . .
Before Spongebob . . .
Back when you put off the 5 hours of homework you had every night.
Back when "U Can't Touch This" was one of your favorite songs.
Back when Offspring was cool.
When carrying cellphones was difficult.
When light up sneakers were cool.
When you rented VHS tapes, not DVDs.
When gas was $0.95 a gallon & Caller ID was a new thing.
When we recorded stuff on VCRs.
When we called the radio station to request songs to hear off of our walkmans.
Pokemon and digimon were on the rage!
Way back.
Before we realized all this would eventually disappear.
Who would have thought you'd miss the 90's so much!!!!!

If you have new ideas to add to this, just let me know

traval plans

well, im leaving for ottawa on the 7th of march, and then going to montreal (laval) sunday night. and then i am going back to ottawa the tusday, then flying back to B.C the wendsday.

Eriks Trip

well im finely out of montreal now. it sucked in the first degree. it was
cold in the first place, then my train was HOURS late. :S then just the boot the hotel was a dive. but i only had to spend 7 hrs there anyway. cuz the train got to montreal at 12 instead of 8.
so i spent a few days being really tired.
well im going over to facebook now, if you want to know more just ask

hi hillary

hi im logged in too! hahaha
well have fun cuz im going to the barn btw im wearing your lounge wear

Blog #2

Well, giving that this isn't actually Erik, I'll state that it is I, Hillary, monkey-ing around with his facebox, because he asked me to, so I'm adding pictures and making this post. I guess I'll reply to what I see below this. I don't care that you're logged in at the same time as me, I'm the only one of us that knows how to use this! Too bad you have to go to the barn, because when you probably come back, I'll be off to C&C, which your mom won't let you go to.

Awww! You are? That's awesome! Just don't get them dirty! lol Love you!

~Hillaryluv

thrusday

lol well i did some landry to day, which totaly sucked.though it did have some perks after though.i would like to write more but all of my writing skillz where used up to post on some ones blog . and i need to go to bed.

I am playing with your facebox.

fri.

well today was a fairly boreing day over all.
though i did have a good convo with hill...i hope that all fits into place as it should. well im not much into writeing and i have to do math so im gonna stop
ERik

Love letter. (from hillaryluv)

As far as the east is from the west, that's how far my love is for you. I wish to be with you always, but right now, I can not, and that is why I write you now. My heart yearns for you to be by my side, holding my waist, caressing my cheek bones, kissing my neck.

I can not describe my love for you in words without making it imperfect. All I can say to barely describe my feelings for you is that I gave you the keys to my heart, and you unlocked a series of emotions I have only felt when experiencing God.

I praise the Lord daily and nightly for bringing you into my life. You must have been sent from Heaven. You are my Guardian Angel, my love, my dear, my all.

With every stroke of my pen, or every key touched to make this letter, my love grows stronger. I think of you consistently. I love you eternally. From the moment our eyes met, I fell in love with you, and my love has been ever growing for you.

taken from my email.

only after i had spent a large amount of time writeing a email that once sent,will be lost forever did i think that i might post somthing? lol so i saved the email and here it is!

oh my goodness, the strange and bizarre people i am staying with!! i really really want to come home,i have had enough of weird and irrational people to last me for a good long time. the thing that i am speaking of in particular,is that i can watch videos on the computer because it will damage it? and I'm not supposed to use Internet explorer or firfox because then the computer will some how,i don't know how exactly, get (gasp) spy-ware on it!
or so i am told from my uncle,AKA a nonsense spewing idiot.
and sadly,his 10 year old son who is no better, places himself on the level of,get this,bill gates!!!
well i leave early Monday,thank goodness.
other than that,its going alright aside from the freezing cold and some snow.
the war museum was totally cool, lol lots of guns and tanks ect. all the stuff a guy needs in life to be complete.
we went to the Hershey factory today and i bought four bags of reject chocolate. and yes i got one kg of dark chocolate,for those of you that worry about such things.
the one nice thing is that i don't have to do any school here, that is something to love with out a doubt. lol i skipped out of math last week because my math tutor was really sick so that worked out very well as i had wasted the week before doing anything but math so i got off on that one! haha yeah i suck
the clothing stores here are sweet, there is more to choose from in one mall then there is in all of Vancouver isl!! ya im in heaven! well it would be much better if i was not broke. oh well,my mum has this really sucky idea that i can help on the farm she even said that they might pay me a bit! oh my! a bit? so much?

brrrrr,they (my aunt and uncle) also seem to have a phobia to turning the heat on! ack its Ottawa people! crank up the heat!!!

a blog

this is not my idea,i stole it. but it seems to me to be very true.would you not agree?
1-touch their waist
2-talk to them
3-share secrets
4-give her your jacket
5-kiss them slowly
6-hug them
7-hold her
8-laugh with her
9-invite her somewhere
10-let her be with you when your with your friends
11-smile with her
12-take pics with her
13-PULL HER ON YOUR LAP
14-when she says she loves you more, deny it. fight back
15-when her friends say i love her more than you, deny it. Fight back and hug her tight so she can't get to her friends. It makes her feel loved
16-always hug her and say i love you when you see her
17-kiss her unexpectedly
18-hug her from behind around the waist
19-tell her she beautiful not sexy!
20-tell her the way you feel about her!
21-kiss her on the lips
22-DONT ask her to buy you stuff. you buy HER stuff
23-TELL HER WHAT FEELS GOOD
24-make her feel loved
25-buy them stuff. like small things can still help
26-don't lie to her
27-dont CHEAT on her
28-take her anywhere she wants
29-txt messege her in the morning and tell her have a good da yat school, and how much you miss
her
30-be there for her when ever she needs you, & even though she doesn't need you juss be there so she'll know that she can always count on you repost this in 20 sec. or you will lose the one you care about the most!!!
31-Chocolate
32-For you not to be shy in public
33-Make her laugh
34-Be sweet and sensitive when she's hurt and/or crying.
35-Sit close to her hold her tight and hodl her hand

saterday.

well sadly i seem to not have waited long enough to close the window.
so i guess i will write a short blog message just to make up for it.
oh,i will prolly tell you,but i will not be able to hang out on sunday cuz we are haveing a dinner so when anna and me get home i will need to help her.

not much

well i just got a job at a car dealer,washing cars and sometimes driveing poeple around. umm im kinda tired right now,so maybe on sunday i will post something long but only if i remember

easter friday.

its a stat and i get to sit around and feel really nasty and gross so far i have thrown up twice,once at 4 this morning and once at about 7:30. now i just really hurt. my chest feels like it was run over by a large truck. and my poor tummy feels like i got punched hard in that area
and no one is online to talk to.
